title: Roosevelt Park Zoo
description: A family-friendly zoo with a variety of animals and interactive exhibits.

title: Dakota Square Mall
description: Minot's largest shopping center with stores, a food court, and movie theater.

title: Taube Museum of Art
description: Gallery showcasing local and regional art with rotating exhibits and events.

title: Minot Public Library
description: Community library offering books, tech access, and family-friendly programs.

title: Trinity Health Hospital
description: A leading regional hospital providing comprehensive healthcare services.

title: Hess Oil and Gas
description: Major energy company operating in the Bakken region with offices in Minot.

title: Town & Country Credit Union
description: A local credit union offering banking, loans, and financial services to the Minot community.

title: X-energy
description: An advanced nuclear energy company bringing innovative solutions to the Minot region.
